values:
THIS WAS MY SPRING BREAK!!!
Thursday- Decided to skip out of work and go to church with Jason. I never thought I could enjoy church, but I actually did. Then the pastor saved me in Jays driveway. Went to Daves later on. Him Sam and Kate were there and we all chilled.
Friday- Good/Bad day. I got to spend it with the best 2 people in the world, Jay and Eugene, along with some others. I got drunk though which was bad, cause I couldn't drive home. Mommy was mad. But there was nothing she could do. hehe. I got sick and Jay took care of me. He is the most amazing guy u will ever meet
Saturday- Skipped out of work again cause I was hung over, then went to sleep at Jays all day. Eh boring. oh well. 
Sunday- Easter. I woke up and ate. Then I slept all day. I felt really sick. It sucked
Monday- hmm... me and Jay went to Eugenes. We sat there for 2 hours talking about what we were going to do. We did nothing so we left. Then we hung out with Dave and decided what to do for another two hours. So we went home. 
Tuesday- Went malling. Bought new shoes. Went to Jays.... I always do the same thing.
Wednesday- Went with Jay to see Eugene and Debbie. We broke down on the side of the freeway and got towed. Then we finally got out there 3 hours later. Learned how to commit a felony on this day. Learned it was pretty cool but theres no way i'd do it myself. Then we had a lot of money so we bought pointless things
Thursday- Van broke down again. We got it fixed. Got more money. haha. Worked. Hung out with Jason. Bought more things. 
Friday- Debbie left Eugene. Me, Jay, Dave, and Dianna met her and made her feel better. We went to the mall. Then Debbie and Jay came over and stayed the night. We stayed up all night talking about sooo many things. God, the bible, ghosts, holy ghosts, acid, Debbie making up stories. oh yeah. great.
Saturday/Sunday- Went meijering at 7 in the morning. Went to work 9-530. Jay was suppose to meet me. I thought he was betraying me, soon to find out the next day it was cause both our phones were turned off. So I went out to Eugenes. Me and him chilled at steves for a while, then we went back to his house just the two of us and had a few beers. It was really nice to be feeling the exact same thing as someone. And it was awesome to be with him without Debbie for a change cause she really fucked him up. So anyway, lots of crying involved that night for the both of us. Steve and others came over and shit went down. Eugene beat his good friend's ass. We had to leave. Went to Dennys at 4 in the morning and complained to the waitress about our problems. He broke his finger. man o man. Then we slept on the couch at his ma's house. Then I took him back and went to work. I only stayed for like an hour and a half though cause I was so upset about Jay and I felt sick n shit. so I got off and went back over eugene's and we watched cruel intentions and went to sleep. Man I missed my buddy so much and he's finally back. I'm so happy. I trust 2 people with all my heart and thats him and Jason. It sucks when one is missing and its rare when both of them are there. Man I love them though. so fucking much. ok i'm falling asleep now
http://sugar7888.livejournal.com/86277.html

WARNING:
This is going to be extremely corny.... I think. 
Please someone tell me what to do

So some very amazing/akward things have been happening to me. It started last Friday. I was hanging with my buddies over at Mikes house and me, wasted, told Justin to come over. So he showed up with Jay and this was the first time I'd saw him since we broke up and I realized how much I still care about him, even though I didn't say a word to him. Then about a week passed. Things were going awesome. I finally felt happy and satisfied with myself(not that I dont anymore). Then I had this dream that Jay called me and I woke up and I was sad.
That night Jay called. This was the first time i'd talked to him since January and what a coincidence that it just happened to be right after my dream. hmm. Anyway, maybe it was seeing each other that made him call me? I dont know. But either way it happened. Usually when I havent talked to someone in a while things are ackward, like I dont know what to say, or hey it should have been really uncomfortable because of all the shit that happened, but things just felt so familiar. Its not even possible to describe how I felt for the whole three hours that we talked. It was like my whole heart poured out, all my thoughts, things I never thought I would discuss with anyone came out of my mouth like it was nothing. I dont know. 
So today I hung out with him. It was just like it used to be... so fricken amazing. We did absolutely nothing. I just feel so comfortable with him and its unexplainable but it makes me all excited and like... drunk i guess u could describe it as. and well u know what? I think that is something that people dont feel very often. I think that should mean something, or maybe i'm thinking too much of it.  
The only reason that i'm worried about this is cause i'm scared. I have finally gotten my life together. I'm finally happy. I finally have good friends that I can count on and well basically i'm just having a pretty damn good life. Then him calling just changed everything for me. Dont get me wrong, i'm so happy that it happened and that we are talking again. I'm just afraid that if something happens with us, I'm afraid I will lose everything. If me and him got together and this happyness never changed, my life would be a blast, but you know what, that is most likely not gonna happen so I can keep on dreaming. But now I think that i've just come to the conclusion with myself that just having that feeling for the shortest time will be totally worth it. I've never had regrets about the first time and I dont think I ever will. 
So wish me luck with whatever
I just hope it all works out for the best
http://sugar7888.livejournal.com/86084.html

Hello. Its Friday night. Guess what that means?
YES I get to get drunk by myself. Its the new tradition.
So I am pretty bored. I had a good ungrounded day today. I woke up this morning and went to Melissas cause my ass had nothing better to do. Melissa is nuts. Just let me tell you.... Anyway yeah then I went to see Mike and Sara cause they are back for the weekend. It was sweet over there. Sara did her sisters and Mikes highlights and they look fuckin goofy as hell. Then I went to work and came home. Now i'm bought to do some homework cause i'm fuckin crazy. 
Anyways, let me just tell you... my life has been like so much better lately. I'm still in the process of learning who my real friends are, but its ok cause at least now my family is here and we are getting along. I dont want to kill myself or leave home anymore so thats a good thing. Maybe its just the fact that i'm single is why i'm happy. Men make me crazy. So yeah. This guy from the Navy is coming to my house tomorrow to give me some info. I might actually join. I'd be sweet to travel the world and make a bunch of new friends.
ok well i'm going to go now cause this is fag

Hello. I am home for lunch and decided to write in here. Yeahhhhh... so um last night was sweet. I went over to sams friends house and we got all drunk and kissed. yeah that was cool. Now I have a hang over and have to be at school. So that sucks. 
So yeah another interesting thing, some girls tried to jump me at work the other day so I called the cops. One day they are going to be reported missing and no one will ever find them cause they will be fucking buried in my back yard. 
ok i'm all done now

Whoa....hey there!
So I havent been online for about a month now. Thats pretty sweet.
I've been having weird days. I guess i'll tell you about them now:
So uh i've been hanging out with all these people..... and they are sweet.
Started going out with Zackery.... pretty sweet
Me and Zack had a eating binge for about 2 weeks. I gained 10 pounds back. 
Ash Wednesday- smoked a lot of cigarettes to celebrate.
Got in a lot of trouble for no apparent reason
Ran away from home
Got picked up on the freeway.....
Mom thinks i'm on drugs so i'm going to take a blood test for her to get her to shut the hell up. Her drug of choice to blame me for doing: extacy 
Its going to be cool when it shows up all clear and she leaves me alone
I stayed the night at Zacks.... and with permission :)
Zack and Corey stayed the night. I passed out. Woke up when scarface died and Zacks like "i'm crying look" it was silly. 
I love scarface by the way
Got a letter from my uncle from jail
He's going to beat andrew hendersons ass for me :)
... and ryan hood
uncle also thinks i'm on drugs cause andrew talks shit in jail. heh hes not going to survive for 2 1/2 more years. 
got lost cause i got off at the wrong harper... that was silly. ended up at like 7 mile. then somehow on southfield freeway. that was scary
i keep sneezing 
I went to the psychiatrist today
Adderall is coming soon.... :) :) :) next thursday if i'm lucky
went to zacks today
went to mikes today
went to melissas today-she is ridiculous by the way
went to school today
cleaned my car today. That was awesome
My dad threw zack out of the car
Zack grabbed a baseball bat
It wasn't a good night

aight i'm done listing gay things. but yeah so my life has been good except for the parental part. I cant stand being accused of things that arent true. Apparently I smoke crack, do heroin, and do extacy everyday. I almost killed myself. Zack saved me. By being there.... I dont know. My life sucks. But its better now. Cause it doesn't consist of much... thats how i like it i guess. Got lots of friends.... only hang out with 3... zack corey and kelly. go to work, go to school. Things could be better, but i'm happy. 
Anyway i'm going now. I'll be back when I feel like it. Maybe next month again or something sweet like that. Gimme a fricken shout on here... or i'll kill you

Hello. Well its been a while since i've written in here. No one seems to write in these things anymore. Damn myspace has taken over.
Anyway, so things have been better for me. Me and Jay are over now. I was sad about it, but more relieved. No more stupid boyfriend stress. Yeah so i've been doing a lot of shit lately. I have a new person in my clique. Zack. Hes fricken the coolest person ever. Its been me him and Justin everyday this week just chillen out. Lets name the things i've done this past few weeks for fun:
-Got my tattoo!!! Fricken sweet I wish I could put a pic. Its the sublime sun
-Skipped school! Got away with it! Those darn family emergencies get them everytime
-Then... got my i-pod stolen
-The girl that stole it went suicidal and is now in a crazy house
-I got to search her house today. I'm going to search more tomorrow. I will prolly take some of her shit too if I cant find it. She had dvd's. I'll sell them at eb games and get a new and better i-pod! Hell i'll do it even if I do find it. Fuck that nasty whore. 
-Played cards with Eugene, Debbie, Steve, and Mike. Started with 25 cents, ended with $3! YEAH! I got to put gas in my car to make it home that day :)
-Had a fricken fun night over Eugenes with Justin, Zack, and whorebag/amanda/likes to steal my i-pod. Eugene wasn't even there for like 2 hours of it. Oh well i just partyed with his roomate and his friends. lol. 
-Almost got shot... yeah I wont talk about that. But it was silly.
-got drunk for the first time in a few months. passed out on the floor. I really hate drinking.
-Hung out with Nick Hauler. We watched a movie. He is cute.
-Quit smoking.   No i'm j/k but I am going to attempt it soon.
-made some new friends at school. Richmond is weird
-Blew off work for a week cause I was diseased. Now i'm a broke ass.
-Filed my first police report...(aww) against i-pod stealing ho-bag
-lost 18 pounds... yup for advice ask me its like the best diet ever! AND YOU CAN STILL EAT LIKE A COW!
-worked out like a mo-fo.... no thats not part of my diet
-went to Melissas countless times
-turned lesbian... haha no j/k just to see if you fucks are still reading this. i'd be pretty damn bored right now if it wasn't me talking
-got ripped off $40
-made my first video for class... it was all fucked up. But thats how we learn right?
-went to Zack Osaer's and was an ass hole. aww i feel bad
-got canker sore disease. That was not fun. I had to tilt my head to eat and shit. haha it didn't stop me though.
-found uncountable ways of getting money when i'm desperate
-went up to Karly Ptach and was like DUUUHHHHH!!! cause she likes to talk shit. and she looks like she has down syndrome. so its my own secret plot against her. no one else thinks its funny but I do cause I know what i'm talking about.
-Bitched out Bill Zydrowski for talking shit. Heh. That was fun.
-People payed us to hang out with them. Once again.
-Ryan Hood went to jail and his brother died. heh that sucks. One less person to pay us to hang out with them.. :(
-saw the real fucking hood and I was scared as hell
-Tryed to play guitar realizing that I lost like all my skill cause I stopped taking lessons. I suck. But I cant afford it.
-Computer broke
-Me, Stacey, Chelsie, and Heather made plans to hang out. I'm actually really excited cause I never hang out with girls. :) aw were homies.
-Got threatened by Amandas family over the telephone cause they thought I was the reason she was cutting herself and had to be put in the crazy house.
-I went over there and made friends with them today. They let me search their house.
-Went to premeire. Hated it. 
-Forced to hang out with Jon and retards. Hated it.
-Jason told me he has more respect for me than any other girl in the world and that he thinks i'm the most beautiful girl he's ever saw. Then we just stopped calling each other. Its been like 2 weeks now....
-Passed 1st semester! One to go and i'm done forever!
-Met Zack's mom. She told him he did good this time. haha. Then she called me.
-shot guns a lot
-shot adam at kroger on a driveby. haha it was funny. we hit him in the forehead.
-zack called in for me and said he was my dad. they didn't believe me, but I got them to. 
-I got stranded. Christina was coming to get us and she went in the ditch. heh. So we walked around in the cold and finally found a ride home from someones mom. 

Ok i'm done. Well at least for now.
http://sugar7888.livejournal.com/84249.html

I was just thinking, I wish there was a copy of myself in this world. Then I could have a friend that isn't fucking stupid.
I'm in a bad mood today. My tounge is messed up. I messed up several things last night. Well actually i've messed up throughout this whole weekend. I messed up Jasons care for me. Oh wait he doesn't care anyway so it doesn't matter. I weirded out Eugene. I had a phase of thinking that a hideous person was attractive for about 5 mins. I got pulled over AGAIN. Wasted all my paycheck. Hmm what else.... who knows. I hate to say it, but I need to stop doing whatever the fuck I want and stop to think about things before I do them. I'm so spontanious and compulsive. Maybe its a mental illness. I hate the way I live my life. Its boring and pointless for me to be around. 
What should I do to mess up my week this week? Suggestions please....
So umm my tounge fucking hurts. Thats all I can think about. Doctors tomorrow. Hell, maybe its from smoking. Doubt it. Maybe I wouldn't do it so much if people didn't piss me off so much.
Yeah. I have a problem right now. I need to see a psychiatrist or something. But the thing is, i'm embarrassed to talk to anyone about my problems because people dont care. The only thing that will come of it is me making myself look bad. So I hide my problems inside of me and I get like this. 
I wish people were like me, or that they understood me. I wish people didn't change. I wish it was 3 weeks ago all over again. I wish I remembered what happened this weekend. I wish life was as me and Jay called it "Acoona Mattatta" again. But after these past two weeks, i'm not sure things will ever be the same again. I messed up way too bad. But I dont blame it on myself. I blame it on everyone else for not caring. For being bad friends. Friends are suppose to be there through everything. Not just shit that they feel like caring about.
Everyone at school doesn't give a shit about me. They think i'm some sort of horrible person or something because I have a life and I have fun. Yeah maybe I get into trouble and do stupid things sometimes, but you know what? You have to get through rough shit to fully appreciate life. I learned that by doing it. Then you have people who sit at home and cut themselves and want to die when they have perfect lives. Richmond is so weird. Then I go anywhere west of richmond and people love me. Too many of them. They are like bugs. They need to stay the fuck away. I dont really understand. I guess Richmond is just not the place for me. Who fucking cares I get out soon. Fuck all yall i'm moving out the country to live by myself or do something good for this world.
The thing that frightens me the most though is that when I get out of school, i'm afraid that I am going to fuck up even more than I did these past two weeks. I'm afraid that I will ruin my life, and all because of other people. 
The only thing left to do is change. I will have to train myself to completely not care about anything. Then at school i'll be able to sit in a corner by myself and have a damn good time. That is the worst thing possible to say, but I have to do it in order to be happy. I cant be around anyone to be happy. The only way to be happy around people is.... well I cant tell you because ur prolly a fucking idiot. You know what? If I told u you'd prolly go and talk to all ur little friends about it and be like hey look what she said look how stupid she is. Yeah not directed on anyone specific, but most people are that way. If your not then I probably havent met you yet.
Ok so that is my deep thoughts for you. Oh wait you dont understand because you are not me, but its ok. I dont blame you for it. Whatever I need to shut the fuck up. YAY LIFE!

Hello again. I'm back just as i said i would be. I got home from Jays about an hour ago. We had a good time. But hey guess who is pathetic and has no life? haha me i've been making a clay mushroom for an hour now. I'm still not done yet.
Ok now it has been 2 hours. I just finished my mushroom and i'm starting on my bottle. I wonder how long this one will take me.
http://sugar7888.livejournal.com/82541.html

So today was a good day. A lot of bad things happened but it turned out being awesome. 
This morning I went to Jays at like 9 and went to sleep with him for a little bit. I missed him last night so I needed to. Then at like 1130 I left to go turn my portfolio into scholastics and ok no one ever told me we had to have a fuckin cd of our work on it. Of course I didn't have it and dont even know how to make one. blah. So they said they will judge it but it wont get sent to new york. How gay is that. PRETTY MUCH.
So then after that I went to work. I felt kind of queezy and lightheaded at work today. Actually all day I did. Sall good now though. 
Anyway, why i'm telling you about my day in this many details I dont know. But whatever. So after work I went to get Justin and me and him went to get clay for my locker presentation. ew. Right now i'm excited to do it though. Then we went to mcdonalds. My mouth was so dry today the onions on my cheeseburger were literally getting stuck in my mouth. When I was done about 5 mins later I was playing with my mouth and I kept pulling out unchewed onions. haha. no one cares but I thought it was funny. 
So then we went on our way to get Dave and Jay. As soon as I got there Daves like I gotta go get my half gallon. I was about to smack him, all he ever wants anymore is to be fucked up. Its not like he has a bad life and needs to. Its just dumb. DUHHHH. Anyway so since he offered me gas money I took him over there. Free gas and i'll drive around the fricken world. So we got there. Same gay people as last night which was soooo stupid. Me and Jay left and went back to his house. It was seriously awesome to finally be alone with him. We hadnt been alone together in days. So we just cuddled and smooched n stuff. It was cute. He has the prettiest eyes i've ever seen. I will never get over them they are wonderful. 
So anyway, now i'm at home. I finally got some adderall so I can concentrate on my fricken homework. I'm actually really excited to do it now. I have such good ideas for it. I decided that I can not use adderall forever though. Even though it is a wonderful thing. I need to learn to always be on adderall, but actually not on it. What i'm saying is that I need to get more modivated. Its like, when I dont take it, i'm lazy. Its not that I want to get bad grades, I just physically cannot get off my ass and spend time on things. Thats why I love adderall so much. I remember shit I learned in 5th grade without even thinking about it. I'll just know. I wish it was like this all the time. Minus the lack of sleep. Thats the only bad part. I always feel like theres things that need to be done and I cannot let myself sleep. But hey i'll change the subject now.
